src:
竹蓀釀肉 有葷有素（視頻）

07 Nov 2019, 02:02

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】招待客人有面子
竹蓀釀肉配料：竹蓀20顆，肉末200克，香菇5朵，香蔥適量，生抽30克，鹽3克，胡椒粉2克，澱粉5克，食用油適量
以下YouTube視頻示範：

text:
Bamboo 荪 stuffed meat is very popular (video)

07 Nov 2019, 02:02

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] Entertaining guests has a face
Bamboo simmered meat ingredients: 20 bamboo stalks, 200 grams of minced meat, 5 mushrooms, chives, 30 grams of soy sauce, 3 grams of salt, 2 grams of pepper, 5 grams of starch, edible oil
The following YouTube video demo:
